thought.author: Chinese Proverb
description: ðŸŽ¯ Regardless of your specific industry, area of expertise or [INSERT WHATEVER YOU WANT HERE], if you want to be successful and grow in the future, the best time to act is now.

Today's #ThoughtsOnProgramming features a Chinese proverb which we've stolen shamelessly from Will Sack's presentation "How to fundraise successfully during a pandemic". Will is the founder of Kindara, a digital health platform and community for women. He also provides training for entrepreneurs on fundraising through his accelerator program at GetFunded.
thought.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.

thought.author: Holy Bible (Proverbs 27:1)
description: ðŸ’¡ There are a lot of reasons for doing #PairProgramming. But ultimately it's about #Teamwork; it requires excellent communication and mutual respect.
thought.quote: As iron sharpens iron, so one person sharpens another.
